description.zh-cn: 华语电影女演员，拥有新加坡国籍。被誉为“第五代导演的电影缪斯”，是首位主演影片包揽欧洲三大影展最高奖的女演员，并曾担任多个国际A类电影节的评委会主席。
description.en: A Chinese-born Singaporean actress. Hailed as the 'muse of the Fifth Generation directors', she is the first actress to star in films that have won the top awards at all three major European film festivals and has served as the jury president for several Class-A international film festivals.

description.zh-cn: 中国“第五代导演”的代表人物之一，曾与巩俐有过长期的电影合作和个人情感关系。
description.en: A representative figure of China's 'Fifth Generation directors', who had a long-term professional collaboration and personal relationship with Gong Li.

description.zh-cn: 英美烟草公司香港总裁，巩俐的前夫。
description.en: Former CEO of British American Tobacco (Hong Kong), ex-husband of Gong Li.

description.zh-cn: 法国电子音乐家，巩俐的现任丈夫。
description.en: A French electronic musician, the current husband of Gong Li.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的戏剧艺术高等学府，巩俐的母校。
description.en: A higher education institution for dramatic arts located in Beijing, China, and Gong Li's alma mater.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国文化部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国文化部
en: Ministry of Culture of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院下属的部门，曾主管文化艺术事务。该机构于1985年特批巩俐进入中央戏剧学院。
description.en: A department under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, formerly in charge of cultural and artistic affairs. The ministry granted special approval for Gong Li's admission to the Central Academy of Drama in 1985.

description.zh-cn: 指1982年后从北京电影学院毕业的中国导演群体，他们的作品标志着中国电影的一个新时代。巩俐被认为是这一代导演的“电影缪斯”。
description.en: Refers to the group of Chinese directors who graduated from the Beijing Film Academy after 1982, whose works marked a new era in Chinese cinema. Gong Li is considered the 'film muse' of this generation of directors.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一场政治运动。巩俐的父亲在此期间被调往山东大学，导致全家迁往济南。
description.en: A political movement in the People's Republic of China. During this period, Gong Li's father was transferred to Shandong University, causing the family to move to Jinan.

description.zh-cn: 中国辽宁省的省会，巩俐的出生地。
description.en: The capital city of Liaoning Province, China, and Gong Li's birthplace.

description.zh-cn: 位于东南亚的岛国和城市国家。巩俐于2008年成为其公民。
description.en: An island country and city-state in Southeast Asia. Gong Li became a citizen in 2008.

description.zh-cn: 西欧国家。法国政府曾授予巩俐“艺术与文学勋章”司令勋位。
description.en: A country in Western Europe. The French government awarded Gong Li the rank of Commander of the Ordre des Arts et des Lettres.

nodes.id: 联合国粮食及农业组织

zh-cn: 联合国粮食及农业组织

description.zh-cn: 联合国的专门机构之一，致力于战胜饥饿。巩俐于2000年被任命为该组织的“民间大使”（粮农大使）。
description.en: A specialized agency of the United Nations that leads international efforts to defeat hunger. Gong Li was appointed as a Goodwill Ambassador for the organization in 2000.

nodes.id: 联合国教育、科学及文化组织

zh-cn: 联合国教育、科学及文化组织

description.zh-cn: 联合国的专门机构之一，旨在通过教育、科学和文化促进国际合作。巩俐于2000年被任命为该组织的“促进和平艺术家”。
description.en: A specialized agency of the United Nations aimed at promoting international cooperation through education, science, and culture. Gong Li was appointed as a UNESCO Artist for Peace in 2000.

description.zh-cn: 联合国的专门机构之一，负责协调全球范围内的环保活动。巩俐于2008年被任命为“全球环境保护大使”。
description.en: A specialized agency of the United Nations responsible for coordinating environmental activities globally. Gong Li was appointed as a Global Environment Ambassador in 2008.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议

description.zh-cn: 中国人民爱国统一战线的组织形式和多党合作、政治协商的重要机构。巩俐曾任第九、第十届全国政协委员。
description.en: The organizational form of the Chinese people's patriotic united front and an important institution for multi-party cooperation and political consultation. Gong Li served as a member of the 9th and 10th National Committees.

description.zh-cn: 世界三大国际电影节之一。巩俐于2000年担任其第50届评委会主席。
description.en: One of the three major international film festivals. Gong Li served as the President of the Jury for its 50th edition in 2000.

description.zh-cn: 世界三大国际电影节之一。巩俐于2002年担任其第59届评委会主席。
description.en: One of the three major international film festivals. Gong Li served as the President of the Jury for its 59th edition in 2002.

description.zh-cn: 世界三大国际电影节之一。巩俐于1997年担任其第50届评委会成员。
description.en: One of the three major international film festivals. Gong Li served as a member of the jury for its 50th edition in 1997.

description.zh-cn: 国际A类电影节之一。巩俐于2003年担任其第16届评委会主席。
description.en: One of the Class-A international film festivals. Gong Li served as the President of the Jury for its 16th edition in 2003.

description.zh-cn: 国际A类电影节之一。巩俐于2014年担任其第17届评委会主席。
description.en: One of the Class-A international film festivals. Gong Li served as the President of the Jury for its 17th edition in 2014.

description.zh-cn: 华语电影界重要的年度奖项。巩俐于2018年担任其第55届评委会主席。
description.en: An important annual award in the Chinese-language film industry. Gong Li served as the President of the Jury for its 55th edition in 2018.

description.zh-cn: 国际A类电影节之一。巩俐于2021年担任其第11届评委会主席。
description.en: One of the Class-A international film festivals. Gong Li served as the President of the Jury for its 11th edition in 2021.

description.zh-cn: 1985年，巩俐考入中央戏剧学院表演系。
description.en: In 1985, Gong Li was admitted to the acting department of the Central Academy of Drama.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国文化部

description.zh-cn: 1985年，因巩俐高考分数与艺术院校录取标准相差11分，中央戏剧学院招生组呈报文化部艺术教育司，获特批录取巩俐。
description.en: In 1985, as Gong Li's college entrance exam score was 11 points below the admission standard for arts institutions, the admissions team of the Central Academy of Drama reported to the Arts Education Department of the Ministry of Culture and received special approval to admit her.

description.zh-cn: 1987年，张艺谋在其导演处女作《红高粱》中启用巩俐为女主角，使其一举成名，开启了她的演艺生涯。
description.en: In 1987, Zhang Yimou cast Gong Li as the lead actress in his directorial debut 'Red Sorghum', which made her famous overnight and launched her acting career.

description.zh-cn: 巩俐与张艺谋曾有过长达八年的恋情，合作了多部电影，后于1995年分手。
description.en: Gong Li and Zhang Yimou were in a romantic relationship for eight years and collaborated on several films, before breaking up in 1995.

description.zh-cn: 巩俐的演艺生涯始于与第五代导演的合作，她主演了该群体导演的多部代表作，被誉为“第五代导演的电影缪斯”。
description.en: Gong Li's acting career began with collaborations with the Fifth Generation directors. She starred in many of their representative works and is hailed as the 'film muse of the Fifth Generation directors'.

description.zh-cn: 巩俐于1996年与英美烟草公司香港总裁黄和祥结婚，两人于2010年离婚。
description.en: Gong Li married Ooi Hoe Seong, CEO of British American Tobacco (Hong Kong), in 1996. They divorced in 2010.

description.zh-cn: 巩俐于2019年与法国电子音乐家让-米歇尔·雅尔结婚。
description.en: Gong Li married French electronic musician Jean-Michel Jarre in 2019.

description.zh-cn: 巩俐于2008年11月8日宣誓入籍新加坡，成为新加坡公民。
description.en: Gong Li took an oath to become a Singaporean citizen on November 8, 2008.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命前期，巩俐的父亲调入山东大学教书，导致全家迁往山东济南。
description.en: In the early stages of the Cultural Revolution, Gong Li's father was transferred to teach at Shandong University, leading the entire family to move to Jinan, Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 2010年，法国文化部授予巩俐“艺术与文学勋章”司令勋位。
description.en: In 2010, the French Ministry of Culture awarded Gong Li the rank of Commander of the Ordre des Arts et des Lettres.

relationships.target: 联合国教育、科学及文化组织

description.zh-cn: 2000年5月，巩俐被任命为联合国教科文组织“促进和平艺术家”。
description.en: In May 2000, Gong Li was appointed as a UNESCO Artist for Peace.

relationships.target: 联合国粮食及农业组织

description.zh-cn: 2000年10月，巩俐被任命为联合国粮农组织的“民间大使”（粮农大使）。
description.en: In October 2000, Gong Li was appointed as a Goodwill Ambassador for the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations.

description.zh-cn: 2008年，联合国环境保护总部邀请巩俐担任全球环境保护大使。
description.en: In 2008, the United Nations Environment Programme invited Gong Li to serve as a Global Environment Ambassador.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议

description.zh-cn: 巩俐曾担任第九届、第十届中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会委员。
description.en: Gong Li served as a member of the 9th and 10th National Committees of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 1997年，巩俐担任第50届戛纳国际电影节主竞赛单元评委。
description.en: In 1997, Gong Li served as a member of the main competition jury at the 50th Cannes Film Festival.

description.zh-cn: 2000年，巩俐担任第50届柏林国际电影节评委会主席。
description.en: In 2000, Gong Li served as the President of the Jury for the 50th Berlin International Film Festival.

description.zh-cn: 2002年，巩俐担任第59届威尼斯国际电影节评委会主席。
description.en: In 2002, Gong Li served as the President of the Jury for the 59th Venice International Film Festival.

description.zh-cn: 2003年，巩俐担任第16届东京国际电影节评委会主席。
description.en: In 2003, Gong Li served as the President of the Jury for the 16th Tokyo International Film Festival.

description.zh-cn: 2014年，巩俐担任第17届上海国际电影节评委会主席。
description.en: In 2014, Gong Li served as the President of the Jury for the 17th Shanghai International Film Festival.

description.zh-cn: 2018年，巩俐担任第55届台湾电影金马奖评委会主席。
description.en: In 2018, Gong Li served as the President of the Jury for the 55th Golden Horse Awards.

description.zh-cn: 2021年，巩俐担任第11届北京国际电影节评委会主席。
description.en: In 2021, Gong Li served as the President of the Jury for the 11th Beijing International Film Festival.
